call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - October 10th 2024

commitments.commitment: Work on activation details for 6.0, making proposals for miners to work on
commitments.quote: I will work on activation details for 6.0, making proposals for miners to work on

commitments.commitment: Write down things and make security proof for sub-blocks proposal
commitments.quote: I also need to write down things. To make security proof also, so I'm checking security proof in protocols

commitments.commitment: Support new Ledger devices (Stax and Flex)
commitments.quote: the new developer is already working on supporting new devices

commitments.commitment: Update the white paper for Dexy and proceed to mainnet launch after audit
commitments.quote: there is need to update the white paper a bit and then, yeah, we will do another round of communication for audit team, make the audit and then, yeah, we will proceed to mainnet launch

commitments.commitment: Visit Dubai in late October for multiple conferences
commitments.quote: I'm going to visit Dubai in late October, so there will be Cardano Summit as well as some other events

open_questions.question: What to do after 6.0 and sub-blocks implementation
open_questions.context: kushti wants community input on future development priorities

open_questions.question: Finding Rust developers for Keystone integrations
open_questions.context: There is a 3000 ERG bounty from ErgoDevsDAO for this work

reversals_or_updates.previous: Need to support Nano S for Ledger integration
reversals_or_updates.update: No need to support Nano S anymore
reversals_or_updates.reason: New device support requirements from Ledger team
reversals_or_updates.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Two reference client releases were done in two days: 5.0.23 today and 6.0.0.2 yesterday
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Sub-blocks are already being generated in DevNet locally and branch can be found on GitHub
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Rosen public testing had 38 watchers in private group using artificial test tokens
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Ledger team requires support for new devices (Stax and Flex) before functional test and third party audits
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: 3000 ERG bounty available from ErgoDevsDAO for Keystone integrations
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Dexy audit was done recently and everything in the code is fixed
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Soft fork voting requires 90 plus percent super majority
key_facts.speaker: kushti
